item.title: Machine Learning A-Z: Hands-On Python & R In Data Science
item.dc:creator: admin

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Learn to create Machine Learning Algorithms in Python and R from two Data Science experts. Code templates included.
a:1:{i:0;s:40:"Just some high school mathematics level.";}

a:11:{i:0;s:37:"Master Machine Learning on Python & R";i:1;s:54:"Have a great intuition of many Machine Learning models";i:2;s:25:"Make accurate predictions";i:3;s:22:"Make powerful analysis";i:4;s:35:"Make robust Machine Learning models";i:5;s:42:"Create strong added value to your business";i:6;s:41:"Use Machine Learning for personal purpose";i:7;s:73:"Handle specific topics like Reinforcement Learning, NLP and Deep Learning";i:8;s:56:"Handle advanced techniques like Dimensionality Reduction";i:9;s:68:"Know which Machine Learning model to choose for each type of problem";i:10;s:99:"Build an army of powerful Machine Learning models and know how to combine them to solve any problem";}
a:3:{i:0;s:37:"Master Machine Learning on Python & R";i:1;s:54:"Have a great intuition of many Machine Learning models";i:2;s:25:"Make accurate predictions";}

a:8:{i:0;s:38:"Anyone interested in Machine Learning.";i:1;s:105:"Students who have at least high school knowledge in math and who want to start learning Machine Learning.";i:2;s:246:"Any intermediate level people who know the basics of machine learning, including the classical algorithms like linear regression or logistic regression, but who want to learn more about it and explore all the different fields of Machine Learning.";i:3;s:135:"Any people who are not that comfortable with coding but who are interested in Machine Learning and want to apply it easily on datasets.";i:4;s:67:"Any students in college who want to start a career in Data Science.";i:5;s:59:"Any data analysts who want to level up in Machine Learning.";i:6;s:88:"Any people who are not satisfied with their job and who want to become a Data Scientist.";i:7;s:101:"Any people who want to create added value to their business by using powerful Machine Learning tools.";}

If you have an internet connection, courses on Udemy are available on any device at any time. If you don't have an internet connection, some instructors also let their students download course lectures. That's up to the instructor though, so make sure you get on their good side!"}]

item.title: Drawing and Painting on the iPad with Procreate
item.dc:creator: admin

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Learn everything you need to know about Procreate with hands on drawing lessons. Now updated for Procreate 4.1.

a:3:{i:0;s:88:"You will need an iPad, preferably a newer one (iPad air, iPad Pro or a recent iPad Mini)";i:1;s:58:"You will need the Procreate application from the app store";i:2;s:52:"Some basic familiarity with the iPad would be useful";}

a:4:{i:0;s:49:"Users will have a deep understanding of Procreate";i:1;s:43:"Create Speedraw videos they can post online";i:2;s:32:"Create and import custom brushes";i:3;s:66:"Have a basic understanding of how to compose and create a painting";}
a:3:{i:0;s:49:"Users will have a deep understanding of Procreate";i:1;s:43:"Create Speedraw videos they can post online";i:2;s:32:"Create and import custom brushes";}
a:3:{i:0;s:53:"People who have an iPad and want to learn how to draw";i:1;s:40:"Illustrators learning to sketch and draw";i:2;s:61:"Illustrators with experience who are unfamiliar with the iPad";}

[{"question":"How long do I have access to the course materials?","answer":"You can view and review the lecture materials indefinitely, like an on-demand channel."},{"question":"Can I take my courses with me wherever I go?","answer":"Definitely! If you have an internet connection, courses on Udemy are available on any device at any time. If you don't have an internet connection, some instructors also let their students download course lectures. That's up to the instructor though, so make sure you get on their good side!"}]

a:4:{s:5:"count";i:44;s:4:"next";N;s:8:"previous";N;s:7:"results";a:44:{i:0;a:7:{s:6:"_class";s:7:"chapter";s:2:"id";i:1586232;s:7:"created";s:20:"2017-01-18T23:10:50Z";s:10:"sort_order";i:43;s:5:"title";s:25:"Introduction to Procreate";s:11:"description";s:0:"";s:12:"is_published";b:1;}i:1;a:13:{s:6:"_class";s:7:"lecture";s:2:"id";i:6393238;s:5:"title";s:12:"Introduction";s:7:"created";s:20:"2017-01-18T23:10:50Z";s:11:"description";s:196:"

Welcome to the course where we are going to be drawing in Procreate on the iPad. in this lecture I'm going over the course and what you can expect and what you will need to take this class.

";s:13:"title_cleaned";s:32:"options-options-and-more-options";s:12:"is_published";b:1;s:10:"transcript";s:0:"";s:15:"is_downloadable";b:1;s:7:"is_free";b:0;s:5:"asset";a:5:{s:6:"_class";s:5:"asset";s:2:"id";i:7806856;s:10:"asset_type";s:5:"Video";s:5:"title";s:11:"part 23.mp4";s:7:"created";s:20:"2017-02-16T21:51:05Z";}s:10:"sort_order";i:13;s:16:"can_be_previewed";b:0;}i:31;a:7:{s:6:"_class";s:7:"chapter";s:2:"id";i:1624306;s:7:"created";s:20:"2017-02-17T21:36:18Z";s:10:"sort_order";i:12;s:5:"title";s:17:"The Final Project";s:11:"description";s:0:"";s:12:"is_published";b:1;}i:32;a:13:{s:6:"_class";s:7:"lecture";s:2:"id";i:6558002;s:5:"title";s:20:"Final Project Part 1";s:7:"created";s:20:"2017-02-17T22:18:49Z";s:11:"description";s:122:"

This is the final project. Where we take everything we've learned up to this point and put it into one composition.

";s:13:"title_cleaned";s:20:"final-project-part-1";s:12:"is_published";b:1;s:10:"transcript";s:0:"";s:15:"is_downloadable";b:1;s:7:"is_free";b:0;s:5:"asset";a:5:{s:6:"_class";s:5:"asset";s:2:"id";i:9755688;s:10:"asset_type";s:5:"Video";s:5:"title";s:12:"PC4 6-27.mp4";s:7:"created";s:20:"2017-09-30T12:27:11Z";}s:10:"sort_order";i:11;s:16:"can_be_previewed";b:0;}i:33;a:13:{s:6:"_class";s:7:"lecture";s:2:"id";i:6558004;s:5:"title";s:20:"Final Project Part 2";s:7:"created";s:20:"2017-02-17T22:18:53Z";s:11:"description";s:120:"

In part two we start creating the background and layer textures on top of each other to create some cool effects.

";s:13:"title_cleaned";s:20:"final-project-part-2";s:12:"is_published";b:1;s:10:"transcript";s:0:"";s:15:"is_downloadable";b:1;s:7:"is_free";b:0;s:5:"asset";a:5:{s:6:"_class";s:5:"asset";s:2:"id";i:9755694;s:10:"asset_type";s:5:"Video";s:5:"title";s:12:"PC4 6-28.mp4";s:7:"created";s:20:"2017-09-30T12:27:11Z";}s:10:"sort_order";i:10;s:16:"can_be_previewed";b:0;}i:34;a:13:{s:6:"_class";s:7:"lecture";s:2:"id";i:6558006;s:5:"title";s:20:"Final Project Part 3";s:7:"created";s:20:"2017-02-17T22:18:59Z";s:11:"description";s:84:"

This is it, we wrap up our final project and add more textures to the leaves.

";s:13:"title_cleaned";s:20:"final-project-part-3";s:12:"is_published";b:1;s:10:"transcript";s:0:"";s:15:"is_downloadable";b:1;s:7:"is_free";b:0;s:5:"asset";a:5:{s:6:"_class";s:5:"asset";s:2:"id";i:9755690;s:10:"asset_type";s:5:"Video";s:5:"title";s:12:"PC4 6-29.mp4";s:7:"created";s:20:"2017-09-30T12:27:11Z";}s:10:"sort_order";i:9;s:16:"can_be_previewed";b:0;}i:35;a:13:{s:6:"_class";s:7:"lecture";s:2:"id";i:9999532;s:5:"title";s:25:"Bonus: Drawing with Masks";s:7:"created";s:20:"2018-04-10T10:59:06Z";s:11:"description";s:207:"

Several folks have asked me to go into more details about masks and how those can be used in their artwork. In this section I use some newspaper textures and apply them to my illustration using masks.

";s:13:"title_cleaned";s:24:"bonus-drawing-with-masks";s:12:"is_published";b:1;s:10:"transcript";s:0:"";s:15:"is_downloadable";b:1;s:7:"is_free";b:0;s:5:"asset";a:5:{s:6:"_class";s:5:"asset";s:2:"id";i:12045378;s:10:"asset_type";s:5:"Video";s:5:"title";s:25:"procreate masks UDEMY.mp4";s:7:"created";s:20:"2018-04-10T11:05:54Z";}s:10:"sort_order";i:8;s:16:"can_be_previewed";b:0;}i:36;a:7:{s:6:"_class";s:7:"chapter";s:2:"id";i:2643202;s:7:"created";s:20:"2018-07-25T19:45:58Z";s:10:"sort_order";i:7;s:5:"title";s:21:"Procreate 4.1 Updates";s:11:"description";s:69:"Students will gain an understanding of the new Procreate 4.1 features";s:12:"is_published";b:1;}i:37;a:13:{s:6:"_class";s:7:"lecture";s:2:"id";i:11184238;s:5:"title";s:26:"Review of the new features";s:7:"created";s:20:"2018-07-25T19:47:14Z";s:11:"description";s:154:"

There have been some new features added in the latest version of Procreate, in this section I'll be reviewing these new features from a high level.

";s:13:"title_cleaned";s:26:"review-of-the-new-features";s:12:"is_published";b:1;s:10:"transcript";s:0:"";s:15:"is_downloadable";b:1;s:7:"is_free";b:1;s:5:"asset";a:5:{s:6:"_class";s:5:"asset";s:2:"id";i:13521408;s:10:"asset_type";s:5:"Video";s:5:"title";s:18:"01 4.1 intro_2.mp4";s:7:"created";s:20:"2018-07-23T13:42:05Z";}s:10:"sort_order";i:6;s:16:"can_be_previewed";b:1;}i:38;a:13:{s:6:"_class";s:7:"lecture";s:2:"id";i:11184246;s:5:"title";s:14:"Drawing Guides";s:7:"created";s:20:"2018-07-25T19:48:51Z";s:11:"description";s:184:"

";s:13:"title_cleaned";s:14:"drawing-guides";s:12:"is_published";b:1;s:10:"transcript";s:0:"";s:15:"is_downloadable";b:1;s:7:"is_free";b:0;s:5:"asset";a:5:{s:6:"_class";s:5:"asset";s:2:"id";i:13521406;s:10:"asset_type";s:5:"Video";s:5:"title";s:24:"02 4.1 drawing guide.mp4";s:7:"created";s:20:"2018-07-23T13:42:05Z";}s:10:"sort_order";i:5;s:16:"can_be_previewed";b:0;}i:39;a:13:{s:6:"_class";s:7:"lecture";s:2:"id";i:11184300;s:5:"title";s:17:"Isometric drawing";s:7:"created";s:20:"2018-07-25T19:59:46Z";s:11:"description";s:167:"

item.title: Landing Page Design & Conversion Rate Optimization 2018
item.dc:creator: admin

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Triple Your Conversion Rate With These Landing Page Design Principles & Build A Landing Page From Scratch With No Code

a:4:{i:0;s:75:"A desire to learn new concepts that will help your online business succeed!";i:1;s:52:"You should have a passion for high conversion rates.";i:2;s:66:"You don't need any coding knowledge or prior web design knowledge.";i:3;s:75:"You should have a landing page or website that you want to send traffic to.";}

a:13:{i:0;s:80:"Design a high converting landing page from scratch without a single line of code";i:1;s:121:"Double or triple your landing page conversion rates by applying the principles of clarity, simplicity and perceived value";i:2;s:92:"Run A/B tests to guarantee a better conversion rate over time without knowing any statistics";i:3;s:119:"Know exactly how to design a call to action that will motivate your visitor's to take the actions you want them to take";i:4;s:76:"Apply psychological persuasion frameworks to your landing pages and websites";i:5;s:116:"Write headlines that will provide the right type of motivational trigger that appeals to the hearts of your visitors";i:6;s:82:"Determine the best type of landing page to send your marketing campaign traffic to";i:7;s:79:"Run professional usability tests like the 5 second test and the preference test";i:8;s:85:"Convince your boss to allocate more company resources to conversion rate optimization";i:9;s:64:"Understand your website traffic based on the Fogg Behavior Model";i:10;s:124:"Determine where in the sales funnel your visitors are and how to design landing pages that cater to each stage in the funnel";i:11;s:52:"Create a professional logo from scratch in Photoshop";i:12;s:129:"Identify the issues that are currently hurting your conversion rate and how to apply good landing page design to fix the problems";}

a:3:{i:0;s:80:"Design a high converting landing page from scratch without a single line of code";i:1;s:121:"Double or triple your landing page conversion rates by applying the principles of clarity, simplicity and perceived value";i:2;s:92:"Run A/B tests to guarantee a better conversion rate over time without knowing any statistics";}

a:10:{i:0;s:14:"Website owners";i:1;s:16:"Online Marketers";i:2;s:9:"Designers";i:3;s:21:"Small Business Owners";i:4;s:18:"Ecommerce Managers";i:5;s:21:"Social Media Managers";i:6;s:48:"Pay Per Click / Search Engine Marketing Managers";i:7;s:13:"Entreprenuers";i:8;s:25:"Digital Marketing Interns";i:9;s:32:"Wed designers and web developers";}

If you have an internet connection, courses on Udemy are available on any device at any time. If you don't have an internet connection, some instructors also let their students download course lectures. That's up to the instructor though, so make sure you get on their good side!","question":"Can I take my courses with me wherever I go?"}]

Let's lay the groundwork for good landing page design";s:7:"created";s:20:"2016-12-21T22:50:24Z";s:11:"description";s:369:"

What we'll cover in this lecture

  • Who I am
  • Why learning landing page design and conversion rate optimization is so important
  • How to make the most out of this course
  • An introduction to the famous 5 second test in web usability
  • An introduction to the principle of clarity in web design
  • Lecture exercise
";s:13:"title_cleaned";s:75:"welcome-to-this-course-lets-lay-the-groundwork-for-good-landing-page-design";s:12:"is_published";b:1;s:10:"transcript";s:0:"";s:15:"is_downloadable";b:0;s:7:"is_free";b:1;s:5:"asset";a:5:{s:6:"_class";s:5:"asset";s:2:"id";i:7431108;s:10:"asset_type";s:5:"Video";s:5:"title";s:13:"1.1 Final.mp4";s:7:"created";s:20:"2016-12-21T23:33:25Z";}s:10:"sort_order";i:53;s:16:"can_be_previewed";b:1;}i:3;a:13:{s:6:"_class";s:7:"lecture";s:2:"id";i:6239896;s:5:"title";s:52:"The Myth Of The Perfect Landing Page Conversion Rate";s:7:"created";s:20:"2016-12-22T01:23:56Z";s:11:"description";s:279:"

In this lecture we'll talk about conversion goals, and why no matter how well you design your landing pages, your conversion rate will always be below 100%. You'll also learn about which visitor segments will be most influenced by improvements by your landing page design.

";s:13:"title_cleaned";s:52:"the-myth-of-the-perfect-landing-page-conversion-rate";s:12:"is_published";b:1;s:10:"transcript";s:0:"";s:15:"is_downloadable";b:0;s:7:"is_free";b:0;s:5:"asset";a:5:{s:6:"_class";s:5:"asset";s:2:"id";i:7431112;s:10:"asset_type";s:5:"Video";s:5:"title";s:13:"1.2 Final.mp4";s:7:"created";s:20:"2016-12-21T23:33:25Z";}s:10:"sort_order";i:52;s:16:"can_be_previewed";b:0;}i:4;a:13:{s:6:"_class";s:7:"lecture";s:2:"id";i:6239902;s:5:"title";s:65:"The 3 Main Types of Landing Pages and How To Use Them Effectively";s:7:"created";s:20:"2016-12-22T01:26:39Z";s:11:"description";s:439:"

Overview of what's covered in this lecture;

  • Understanding dedicated landing pages, microsites and main site landing pages
  • The defining characteristics of each type of landing page
  • Understanding the concept of attention ratio
  • How to determine the right type of landing page design for your campaigns
  • Real life examples from around the web
  • Lecture exercise

  • How to design high converting CTA's
  • How to use your headline to support your conversion action
  • How to write copy for your calls to action
  • Using graphics and visuals to support your calls to action
  • Setting post click expectations so visitors feel safe converting on your landing pages
  • Removing visual distractions from around your conversion block
  • How to design buttons so visitors know they're clickable right away
  • Lecture Exercise: Finding ways to improve your CTA's using the principles discussed in this lectures

Readability is a well known concept in general, but it's not used enough in landing page design best practices. In this lecture you will learn:

  • How we people read on the web
  • How to format your text for scanning
  • How your visitors perceive your website or landing page copy
  • How to create effective visual hierarchies
  • The best way to write paragraphs
  • The importance of objectivity and removing unnecessary jargon from your copy
  • How to format your heading for maximum readability
  • How to create a sense of consistency with your text formatting
  • Examples of distinctive style and aesthetics while still remaining readable
  • Lecture Exercise: Rewriting your homepage copy using half the words you currently have

Conventions on the web are very important to know and respect. Conventions are formed based on years and thousands of hours of web browsing and people expect things to work in a certain way.

In this lecture you will learn:

  • Why conventions are so important
  • Rules for defying a convention
  • Conventions in landing page design like logo, site ID and navigational structure
  • Header and footer conventions
  • Conventions for ads on your site, headers and other elements on your landing pages
  • Research that has shown conventions to be essential to good user experience
";s:13:"title_cleaned";s:49:"respecting-web-conventions-in-landing-page-design";s:12:"is_published";b:1;s:10:"transcript";s:0:"";s:15:"is_downloadable";b:0;s:7:"is_free";b:0;s:5:"asset";a:5:{s:6:"_class";s:5:"asset";s:2:"id";i:7439480;s:10:"asset_type";s:5:"Video";s:5:"title";s:13:"2.6 Final.mp4";s:7:"created";s:20:"2016-12-23T01:34:55Z";}s:10:"sort_order";i:35;s:16:"can_be_previewed";b:0;}i:21;a:13:{s:6:"_class";s:7:"lecture";s:2:"id";i:6246234;s:5:"title";s:76:"Using Videos, Graphics and Imagery to Increase Landing Page Conversion Rates";s:7:"created";s:20:"2016-12-23T01:29:28Z";s:11:"description";s:1006:"

Every good landing page and website uses images, graphics, iconography and / or video to enhance the visual appeal of their landing page or to help convey their message.

In this lecture you will learn:

  • The important role images play in giving your visitors a great first impression
  • How to use images and graphics to tell a story
  • The importance of evoking emotion with your visual components
  • How to find and use high quality stock photography when you don't have custom imagery available
  • When your images and graphics will hurt rather than improve your conversion rate
  • Landing page design best practices for using images and graphics
  • Design trends for background images
  • How to use icons and thumbnails to break up copy and give your pages more flow and breathability
  • Examples of good (and bad) use of graphics from around the web
  • How to use videos to increase conversion rate on your landing pages

Information architecture and accessibility are two important concepts in making your landing pages more enjoyable to use by your visitors.

In this lecture you will learn:

  • How to organize your content effectively on your landing page
  • Make sure the right information appears above the fold
  • How to assess the ease-of-use of your navigation
  • The importance of giving the user feedback on elements that should be giving feedback
  • Breaking down the elements of a web page into components like Site ID, Primary Nav, Site Search, Utilities, Breadcrumbs, Page Title, Product Filters and Footer Navigation
  • How to give your users a sense of orientation and direction
  • Contrast with your color scheme
  • Tips on choosing the right font and font size for your demographics
  • Tips for formatting your text for maximum legibility
  • Lecture Exercise: Steve Krugs Trunk Test
";s:13:"title_cleaned";s:77:"information-architecture-and-accessibility-landing-page-design-best-practices";s:12:"is_published";b:1;s:10:"transcript";s:0:"";s:15:"is_downloadable";b:0;s:7:"is_free";b:0;s:5:"asset";a:5:{s:6:"_class";s:5:"asset";s:2:"id";i:7441038;s:10:"asset_type";s:5:"Video";s:5:"title";s:7:"2.8.mp4";s:7:"created";s:20:"2016-12-23T07:24:29Z";}s:10:"sort_order";i:33;s:16:"can_be_previewed";b:0;}i:23;a:13:{s:6:"_class";s:7:"lecture";s:2:"id";i:6263068;s:5:"title";s:73:"Trust, Safety and Credibility (Part 1) Landing Page Design Best Practices";s:7:"created";s:20:"2016-12-26T17:40:52Z";s:11:"description";s:877:"

A users likelihood to convert on your landing page is directly related to the sense of security and trust your landing page conveys when a person first lands on your site.

In this lecture you will learn:

  • Concepts of neatness, organization and high production quality in landing page design
  • Real world preference tests on three different designs in the auto industry with different levels of overall production quality
  • How to provide transactional assurances that will counteract the anxieties your visitors have
  • How to use satisfaction guarantees and company policies to increase trust and security
  • Using logos, media mentions and badges properly in your landing page designs
  • Understanding social identity and customer reviews to your advantage
  • Landing page design best practices in the real world

Dedicated landing pages are used to highlight specific products or services, and they are used to accept traffic from individual ppc campaigns.

In this lecture you will learn:

  • Landing page design best practices for the dedicated landing page
  • The importance of a clear headline and clear call to action
  • Breaking down a landing page step by step and pointing out all the areas that can be improved upon
  • Real life examples from PPC landing pages across the internet

Scarcity is an important psychological concept in landing page design and you can use it effectively in your landing pages to improve your conversion rate

In this lecture you will learn:

  • How to create a sense of urgency with scarcity
  • How to use deadlines in landing page design for seasonal products
  • Examples of scarcity in web design
  • How to be specific and valuable
";s:13:"title_cleaned";s:64:"using-scarcity-to-improve-conversion-rates-on-your-landing-pages";s:12:"is_published";b:1;s:10:"transcript";s:0:"";s:15:"is_downloadable";b:0;s:7:"is_free";b:0;s:5:"asset";a:5:{s:6:"_class";s:5:"asset";s:2:"id";i:7459682;s:10:"asset_type";s:5:"Video";s:5:"title";s:13:"3.1 Final.mp4";s:7:"created";s:20:"2016-12-27T03:29:26Z";}s:10:"sort_order";i:26;s:16:"can_be_previewed";b:0;}i:30;a:13:{s:6:"_class";s:7:"lecture";s:2:"id";i:6276264;s:5:"title";s:79:"Principles of Persuasion: Reciprocal Concessions & Reciprocity in Landing Pages";s:7:"created";s:20:"2016-12-28T23:07:44Z";s:11:"description";s:621:"

The principles of reciprocity and reciprocal concessions can be found all over the web in landing page design. They are two very important concepts worth considering when writing copy for your landing pages.

In this lecture you will learn:

  • How to engender a sense of gratitude and indebtedness in your website visitors
  • How to apply negotiating principles and techniques in your landing page design
  • Different ideas for implementing reciprocity in any business model
  • Using reciprocal concessions in conjunction with other landing page persuasion concepts


";s:13:"title_cleaned";s:76:"principles-of-persuasion-reciprocal-concessions-reciprocity-in-landing-pages";s:12:"is_published";b:1;s:10:"transcript";s:0:"";s:15:"is_downloadable";b:0;s:7:"is_free";b:0;s:5:"asset";a:5:{s:6:"_class";s:5:"asset";s:2:"id";i:7471930;s:10:"asset_type";s:5:"Video";s:5:"title";s:7:"3.2.mp4";s:7:"created";s:20:"2016-12-28T23:10:49Z";}s:10:"sort_order";i:25;s:16:"can_be_previewed";b:0;}i:31;a:13:{s:6:"_class";s:7:"lecture";s:2:"id";i:6276298;s:5:"title";s:67:"Principles of Persuasion: Anchoring and Cognitive Dissonance Theory";s:7:"created";s:20:"2016-12-28T23:16:33Z";s:11:"description";s:501:"

When it comes to pricing your products and services, anchoring and cognitive dissonance theory are two very powerful persuasion frameworks that can increase your conversion rates.

  • Real life example of an anchoring test
  • Examples of persuasion frameworks being used effectively on landing pages throughout the web
  • How people rationalize their decisions based on their previous efforts
  • How to win more clients by understanding cognitive dissonance theory
";s:13:"title_cleaned";s:66:"principles-of-persuasion-anchoring-and-cognitive-dissonance-theory";s:12:"is_published";b:1;s:10:"transcript";s:0:"";s:15:"is_downloadable";b:0;s:7:"is_free";b:0;s:5:"asset";a:5:{s:6:"_class";s:5:"asset";s:2:"id";i:7472000;s:10:"asset_type";s:5:"Video";s:5:"title";s:13:"3.3 Final.mp4";s:7:"created";s:20:"2016-12-28T23:21:06Z";}s:10:"sort_order";i:24;s:16:"can_be_previewed";b:0;}i:32;a:13:{s:6:"_class";s:7:"lecture";s:2:"id";i:6277464;s:5:"title";s:63:"User Scenarios and Contextual Perception in Landing Page Design";s:7:"created";s:20:"2016-12-29T04:34:18Z";s:11:"description";s:952:"

In this lecture you will learn:

  • The power of empathy in landing page design
  • How your visitors differ from each other and how your website visitors will typically feel about your products and services differently then how you think they do
  • Understanding the importance of contextual awareness
  • How to think about your website visitors in the greater picture: Where they came from, what they want and what their motivations are
  • Using analytics tools to understand where your website visitors came from and what their demographics are
  • Understanding the difference between organic, PPC, social and email traffic
  • How to build user scenarios to get an intuitive feel for your visitors
  • Building personas to understand the knowledge your visitors have and what their anxieties are
  • How to build complex and complete user scenarios
  • Lecture exercise

item.title: Contact form
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[text* name class:form-control placeholder "Your Name"]
[email* email class:form-control placeholder "Your Email"]
[textarea* message x9 class:form-control]
[submit class:btn class:btn-default "Submit"]
1 Contact Us [name] bot@stylemixthemes.com Name: [name] E-mail:[email] Message: [message] Reply-To: [email] Masterstudy "[your-subject]" Masterstudy [your-email] Message Body: [your-message] -- This e-mail was sent from a contact form on Masterstudy (http://localhost:8888/masterstudy-test) Reply-To: a.salihov@stylemix.net Thank you for your message. It has been sent. There was an error trying to send your message. Please try again later. One or more fields have an error. Please check and try again. There was an error trying to send your message. Please try again later. You must accept the terms and conditions before sending your message. The field is required. The field is too long. The field is too short. The date format is incorrect. The date is before the earliest one allowed. The date is after the latest one allowed. There was an unknown error uploading the file. You are not allowed to upload files of this type. The file is too big. There was an error uploading the file. The number format is invalid. The number is smaller than the minimum allowed. The number is larger than the maximum allowed. The answer to the quiz is incorrect. The e-mail address entered is invalid. The URL is invalid. The telephone number is invalid.
